author: Waka Laka

text: Can I join next year, or maybe the year after that? I really do want to enter one of these contests someday, but right now I don't know much about making music. Anyway, thanks for the invitation! Good luck in the contest! I think I might throw this page in my book marks so I can enter someday! Someday I would also like to try that robot master mega man music contest or whatever it's called.Can't remember the name of that contest, but it sounds really fun too!
author: mattasaurs

text: Awesome.  Thanks for the info.  I love video-game related contests.  Always provides me some games I wasn't aware of.  PS, thanks so much for reuploading those two songs that went down a while ago.
author: Rob Lowe

text:
I've been getting tons of requests to promote various websites or products and I'd rather not start doing that, but this is a special exception. I'm not really active there anymore but I'm always there to vote in the contests.

By the way, the channel now has the newï»¿ design so we'll have to get used to it. I'll post the next VGM tonight.
